verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בִּשְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> Now it came to pass in the thirtieth שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> year בָּֽרְבִיעִי֙ <WH7243> in the fourth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I בְתֽוֹךְ־ <WH8432> as I [was] among הַגּוֹלָ֖ה <WH1473> the captives עַל־ <WH5921> was by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> of Chebar נִפְתְּחוּ֙ <WH6605> were opened הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> [that] the heavens וָאֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> and I saw מַרְא֥וֹת <WH4759> visions אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> In the fifth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הִ֚יא <WH1931> he הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַחֲמִישִׁ֔ית <WH2549> which [was] the fifth לְגָל֖וּת <WH1546> captivity הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יוֹיָכִֽין׃ <WH3112> Jehoiachin's

הָיֹ֣ה <WH1961> came הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> expressly דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְחֶזְקֵ֨אל <WH3168> came expressly unto Ezekiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בּוּזִ֧י <WH941> of Buzi הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans עַל־ <WH5921> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> Chebar וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> came עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there יַד־ <WH3027> and the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וָאֵ֡רֶא <WH7200> And I looked וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold ר֨וּחַ <WH7307> wind סְעָרָ֜ה <WH5591> A storm בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> came מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> out of the north עָנָ֤ן <WH6051> cloud גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> a great וְאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> and a fire מִתְלַקַּ֔חַת <WH3947> infolding וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <WH5051> itself and a brightness ל֖וֹ סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> [was] about וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> it and out of the midst כְּעֵ֥ין <WH5869> thereof as the colour הַחַשְׁמַ֖ל <WH2830> of amber מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of the fire

וּמִ֨תּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> Also out of the midst דְּמ֖וּת <WH1823> thereof [came] the likeness אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> of four חַיּ֑וֹת <WH2416> living creatures וְזֶה֙ <WH2088> and this מַרְאֵֽיהֶ֔ן <WH4758> And this [was] their appearance דְּמ֥וּת <WH1823> had the likeness אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of a man לָהֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> they
וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> had four פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> faces לְאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> And every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> wings לְאַחַ֥ת <WH259> and every one לָהֶֽם׃

וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> And their feet רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> feet יְשָׁרָ֑ה <WH3477> [were] straight וְכַ֣ף <WH3709> and the sole רַגְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7272> of their feet כְּכַף֙ <WH3709> [was] like the sole רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> foot עֵ֔גֶל <WH5695> of a calf's וְנֹ֣צְצִ֔ים <WH5340> and they sparkled כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> like the colour נְחֹ֥שֶׁת <WH5178> brass קָלָֽל׃ <WH7044> of burnished

[וְיָדֹו כ] (וִידֵ֣י <WH3027> able ק) אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of a man מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> Under כַּנְפֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3671> under their wings עַ֖ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> on their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7253> sides וּפְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH6440> had their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3671> and their wings לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽם׃ <WH702> and they four

חֹֽבְרֹ֛ת <WH2266> [were] joined אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחוֹתָ֖הּ <WH269> to another כַּנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3671> Their wings לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יִסַּ֣בּוּ <WH5437> they turned בְלֶכְתָּ֔ן <WH1980> moved אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> straight פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> went

וּדְמ֣וּת <WH1823> As for the likeness פְּנֵיהֶם֮ <WH6440> of their faces פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> had the face אָדָם֒ <WH120> of a man וּפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> and the face אַרְיֵ֤ה <WH738> of a lion אֶל־ <WH413> on הַיָּמִין֙ <WH3225> on the right side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <WH702> they four וּפְנֵי־ <WH6440> had the face שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> of an ox מֵֽהַשְּׂמֹ֖אול <WH8040> on the left side לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <WH702> and they four וּפְנֵי־ <WH6440> also had the face נֶ֖שֶׁר <WH5404> of an eagle לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <WH702> they four

וּפְנֵיהֶ֕ם <WH6440> Thus [were] their faces וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3671> and their wings פְּרֻד֖וֹת <WH6504> [were] stretched מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> upward לְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> [wings] of every one שְׁ֚תַּיִם <WH8147> two חֹבְר֣וֹת <WH2266> [were] joined אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> one וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> and two מְכַסּ֔וֹת <WH3680> covered אֵ֖ת <WH853> גְּוִיֹתֵיהֶֽנָה׃ <WH1472> their bodies

וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> straight פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> forward יֵלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> went אֶ֣ל <WH413> about אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֨מָּה <WH8033> in it הָר֤וּחַ <WH7307> whither the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> go לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <WH1980> went

וּדְמ֨וּת <WH1823> As for the likeness הַחַיּ֜וֹת <WH2416> of the living creatures מַרְאֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4758> their appearance כְּגַחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> coals אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> of fire בֹּֽעֲרוֹת֙ <WH1197> [was] like burning כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> [and] like the appearance הַלַּפִּדִ֔ים <WH3940> of lamps הִ֕יא <WH1931> he מִתְהַלֶּ֖כֶת <WH1980> it went up and down בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among הַחַיּ֑וֹת <WH2416> among the living creatures וְנֹ֣גַהּ <WH5051> was bright לָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> and the fire וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הָאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> and out of the fire יוֹצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth בָרָֽק׃ <WH1300> lightning
וְהַחַיּ֖וֹת <WH2416> And the living creatures רָצ֣וֹא <WH7519> ran וָשׁ֑וֹב <WH7725> and returned כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <WH4758> as the appearance הַבָּזָֽק׃ <WH965> of a flash of lightning

וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> Now as I beheld הַחַיּ֑וֹת <WH2416> the living creatures וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold אוֹפַ֨ן <WH212> wheel אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> behold one בָּאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> by הַחַיּ֖וֹת <WH2416> the living creatures לְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> with his four פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> faces

מַרְאֵ֨ה <WH4758> The appearance הָאוֹפַנִּ֤ים <WH212> of the wheels וּמַעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <WH4639> and their work כְּעֵ֣ין <WH5869> [was] like unto the colour תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <WH8658> of a beryl וּדְמ֥וּת <WH1823> likeness אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ן <WH702> and they four וּמַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <WH4758> and their appearance וּמַ֣עֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <WH4639> and their work כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <WH212> [was] as it were a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the middle הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> of a wheel

עַל־ <WH5921> in אַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶ֖ן <WH7253> sides בְּלֶכְתָּ֣ם <WH1980> moved יֵלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> moved לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> [and] they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽן׃ <WH1980> moved

וְגַ֨בֵּיהֶ֔ן <WH1354> As for their rings וְגֹ֥בַהּ <WH1363> they were so high לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like וְיִרְאָ֣ה <WH3374> that they were dreadful לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וְגַבֹּתָ֗ם <WH1354> and their rings מְלֵאֹ֥ת <WH4392> [were] full עֵינַ֛יִם <WH5869> of eyes סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּֽן׃ <WH702> them four

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> moved הַֽחַיּ֔וֹת <WH2416> And when the living creatures יֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> moved הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <WH681> by them וּבְהִנָּשֵׂ֤א <WH5375> were lifted up הַֽחַיּוֹת֙ <WH2416> and when the living creatures מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> from the earth יִנָּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> were lifted up הָאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <WH212> the wheels

עַ֣ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become שָּׁ֨ם <WH8033> direction הָר֤וּחַ <WH7307> Whithersoever the spirit לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to go יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> go שָׁ֥מָּה <WH8033> direction הָר֖וּחַ <WH7307> thither [was their] spirit לָלֶ֑כֶת <WH1980> to go וְהָאוֹפַנִּ֗ים <WH212> and the wheels יִנָּשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> were lifted up לְעֻמָּתָ֔ם <WH5980> over against כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> them for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> of the living creature בָּאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <WH212> [was] in the wheels

בְּלֶכְתָּ֣ם <WH1980> went יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> went וּבְעָמְדָ֖ם <WH5975> and when those stood יַֽעֲמֹ֑דוּ <WH5975> [these] stood וּֽבְהִנָּשְׂאָ֞ם <WH5375> and when those were lifted up מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> from the earth יִנָּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> were lifted up הָאֽוֹפַנִּים֙ <WH212> the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֔ם <WH5980> over against כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> them for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> of the living creature בָּאוֹפַנִּֽים׃ <WH212> [was] in the wheels

וּדְמ֞וּת <WH1823> And the likeness עַל־ <WH5921> now over רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> upon the heads הַחַיָּה֙ <WH2416> of the living creature רָקִ֔יעַ <WH7549> of the firmament כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> [was] as the colour הַקֶּ֣רַח <WH7140> crystal הַנּוֹרָ֑א <WH3372> of the terrible נָט֥וּי <WH5186> stretched forth עַל־ <WH5921> now over רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH7218> over their heads מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above

וְתַ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> Under הָרָקִ֔יעַ <WH7549> And under the firmament כַּנְפֵיהֶ֣ם <WH3671> [were] their wings יְשָׁר֔וֹת <WH3477> straight אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> the one אֶל־ <WH413> toward אֲחוֹתָ֑הּ <WH269> toward the other לְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> every one שְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> had two מְכַסּוֹת֙ <WH3680> which covered לָהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> on this side וּלְאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> and every one שְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> had two מְכַסּוֹת֙ <WH3680> which covered לָהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> on that side אֵ֖ת <WH853> גְּוִיֹּתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1472> their bodies

וָאֶשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> I heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the noise כַּנְפֵיהֶ֡ם <WH3671> of their wings כְּקוֹל֩ <WH6963> like the noise מַ֨יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֤ים <WH7227> of great כְּקוֹל־ <WH6963> as the voice שַׁדַּי֙ <WH7706> of the Almighty בְּלֶכְתָּ֔ם <WH1980> went ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice הֲמֻלָּ֖ה <WH1999> of speech כְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> as the noise מַחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> of an host בְּעָמְדָ֖ם <WH5975> when they stood תְּרַפֶּ֥ינָה <WH7503> they let down כַנְפֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH3671> their wings

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> came ק֕וֹל <WH6963> And there was a voice מֵעַ֕ל <WH5921> above לָרָקִ֖יעַ <WH7549> from the firmament אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> that [was] over their heads בְּעָמְדָ֖ם <WH5975> when they stood תְּרַפֶּ֥ינָה <WH7503> [and] had let down כַנְפֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH3671> their wings

וּמִמַּ֗עַל <WH4605> And above לָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <WH7549> the firmament אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשָׁ֔ם <WH7218> that [was] over their heads כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> as the appearance אֶֽבֶן־ <WH68> stone סַפִּ֖יר <WH5601> of a sapphire דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> [was] the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <WH3678> of a throne וְעַל֙ <WH5921> was over דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> and upon the likeness הַכִּסֵּ֔א <WH3678> of the throne דְּמ֞וּת <WH1823> [was] the likeness כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> as the appearance אָדָ֛ם <WH120> of a man עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> was over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above

וָאֵ֣רֶא ׀ <WH7200> And I saw כְּעֵ֣ין <WH5869> as the colour חַשְׁמַ֗ל <WH2830> of amber כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> as the appearance אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> of fire בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> within לָהּ֙ סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> it from the appearance מָתְנָ֖יו <WH4975> of his loins וּלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> even upward וּמִמַּרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> and from the appearance מָתְנָיו֙ <WH4975> of his loins וּלְמַ֔טָּה <WH4295> even downward רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> I saw כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> as it were the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of fire וְנֹ֥גַֽהּ <WH5051> and it had brightness ל֖וֹ סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> As the appearance הַקֶּ֡שֶׁת <WH7198> of the bow אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become בֶעָנָ֜ן <WH6051> that is in the cloud בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day הַגֶּ֗שֶׁם <WH1653> of rain כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so מַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> so [was] the appearance הַנֹּ֙גַהּ֙ <WH5051> of the brightness סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about ה֕וּא <WH1931> Such מַרְאֵ֖ה <WH4758> This [was] the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> of the likeness כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> of the glory יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וָֽאֶרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> And when I saw וָאֶפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> [it] I fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנַ֔י <WH6440> upon my face וָאֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and I heard ק֥וֹל <WH6963> a voice מְדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> of one that spake ס
